Name: Nanhi Pari
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Cr√®me de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
MUDDLE rosemary in base of mixing glass.
Add other ingredients and STIR with ice.
Review: Dry tannins in the red wine are balanced by cherry brandy and coffee liqueur with a slug of vodka adding backbone.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Carl Anthony Brown at the Waldorf Astoria Syon Park in London, England. (Carl's original recipe omitted vodka.)
